snippet: A statement from the American military, which promised an investigation, said the strike might have led to the deaths of Iraqi soldiers.
abstract: American military officials announce investigation will take place into airstrike against Islamic State positions near Falluja, Iraq, that may have resulted in deaths of Iraqi soldiers.
lead_paragraph: A statement from the American military, which promised an investigation, said the strike might have led to the deaths of Iraqi soldiers.

headline.main: Inquiry Is Promised About Airstrike in Iraq by Coalition Fighting ISIS
headline.print_headline: Middle East; Iraq: Airstrike Is to be Investigated
